document.full_text: bank of america corp won the dismissal of a bias lawsuit by black financial advisers at the former merrill lynch & co who said they were paid lower bonuses than white counterparts to stay on when the companies merged.
document.title: black brokers lose bias suit against bofa/merrill
lines_and_colors: bank of america corp won the dismissal of a bias lawsuit by black financial advisers at the former merrill lynch & co who said they were paid lower bonuses than white counterparts to stay on when the companies merged.
